QueryViewSpec.Name: RGL Populate Exceptions Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays rows in exception table from RGL populate script.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select c.ID ,r.lookupid as REVENUEID ,sc.lookupid as COMMITMENTID ,USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION.SPONSORLOOKUPID ,USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION.INITIALSTATUS ,USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION.CONVERSIONDATE ,USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION.TARGETACTIONCODE ,USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION.INSERTDATE from dbo.USR_RGL_POPULATION_EXCEPTION join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = RGID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.ID = TARGETSPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.LOOKUPID = SPONSORLOOKUPID
